title: Settlers VII Paths to a Kingdom OST - Official Steam's Soundtrac
description:
This is a High Quality Compression version of the raw uncompressed wav files given in the Steam's Settlers VII Gold Edition. Since this version of the game is no longer available on Steam, only a Gold Deluxe vesion (soundtrack not included), i've had a pain to get the Album. But eventually i've managed to share u all settlers fans this AMAZING sountrack full with live orchestra of Dynamedion and the angelic voice of Kariina Gretere


Any way there is theraw big version here:
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5461267/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5461267/</a>


So, i've made the compression using Audacity and aded some cover, and decent tags:

Here,s the track list:


1. The Hero Within (Song)       Kariina      2:56

2. Ever After (Song)            Kariina      3:26

3. New Worlds Dawn              Dynamedion   3:06

4. Working Apart                Dynamedion   2:07

5. Ancient Times and Kingdoms   Dynamedion   2:33

6. The Dragons Hoard            Dynamedion   2:52

7. Saints and Settlers          Dynamedion   2:22

8. Follow the Holy Book         Dynamedion   2:55

9. Divine Power                 Dynamedion   2:58

10.Meadows and Hills            Dynamedion   2:15

11.Hearts to Steal              Dynamedion   3:07

12.We Are Broke                 Dynamedion   3:04

13.Golden Gems                  Dynamedion   2:42

14.Stand Your Ground            Dynamedion   3:19

15.Together We Stand            Dynamedion   2:37

16.We Work for God              Dynamedion   2:55

17.Victory of the Dark          Dynamedion   2:34

18.Money Rules the World        Dynamedion   3:05

19.Dark Defeats                 Dynamedion   2:41

20.Victory Is Life              Dynamedion   2:27

21.Forlorn Soldiers             Dynamedion   2:57

22.Silver Stars                 Dynamedion   2:13

23.Thief of Time                Dynamedion   1:29

24.You Fight, You Win           Dynamedion   2:54

25.The Hero Revisited (Song)    Kariina      1:32

26.Within the Settlers (Song)   Kariina      1:40

27.All Is Well (That Ends Well) Dynamedion   1:18



Hope u all enjoy
